subtitle: Linear regression R² — trend quality score.

measures.how_to_read: Closer to 1.0 = better linear fit; near 0 = noisy/no trend.
measures.caveats: Linearity assumption; can be gamed by outliers.
measures.what_it_measures: Lr R2 derived from market data.

assistant_hints: Higher R² implies cleaner linear trend; set a threshold gate.
Combine with slope sign for direction.
Longer windows reduce noise but add lag.
Beware outliers skewing fit; consider robust methods.
